translations: v.使产生幻觉（hallucinate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: House was the best doctor on TV until he began hallucinating last season.
sentences.translation: 豪斯是电视上最好的医生，直到他上一季开始出现幻觉。

sentences.sentence: I keep hallucinating that I'm a dog. A large, white, hairy Pyrenees mountain dog.
sentences.translation: 那人继续说，“我总是有一种幻觉，觉得自己是条狗，是条巨大的、白色的毛的比利牛斯山脉犬。”

sentences.sentence: A year later Ms Harris has her first manic attack, not sleeping for days, hallucinating, on relentless overdrive.
sentences.translation: 一年之后Harris女士的狂躁症便第一次发作，她好几天都睡不着觉，产生幻觉并持续工作过度。
